content:
HOME PROGRAM REGISTRATION HOTELS, MAPS, & DIRECTIONS ORGANIZING
COMMITTEE 		FOR MORE INFORMATION



WISEN will be held at the University of California, Irvine (UCI). UCI is 10 minutes/4 miles from the Orange County/John Wayne Airport. It is 1 hour - 1 hour 30 minutes (depending on traffic)/45 miles from LAX.

The workshop will be held in the McDonnell Douglas Auditorium. Breakout sessions will be held in the new Information and Computer Science building (ICS2), rooms 136 and 144.

Directions and printable maps of UCI (including the McDonnell Douglas Auditorium, building #311, and ICS2, building #304) and the surrounding area are available. A map and parking information will be mailed to you upon registration.




The following hotels are holding rooms for the nights of July 12, 13, and 14.
Irvine Marriott
18000 Von Karman Ave.
Irvine, CA 92612
Phone: +1 800-228-9290
Fax: +1 949-261-7059
 
$129.00 per night
Rate available until 6/22.
Located in the Koll Business Center just off I-405. One-half mile to Orange County/John Wayne airport. Free shuttle service to and from John Wayne airport and UCI, by arrangement. Parking: max. $8.00 per day for self parking or $5.00 for overnight. Valet parking also available.
Country Side Inn & Suites
325 Bristol Street
Costa Mesa, CA 92626
Phone: +1 800-322-9992
Fax: +1 949-662-0828
 
$85.00* per night
Rate available until 6/22.
*includes breakfast buffet
Located on Bristol Street South, on the corner of Bristol and Redhill. 1 mile from Orange County/John Wayne airport. Free shuttle service to and from John Wayne airport, by arrangement. Free parking at the hotel.
Holiday Inn Select
17941 Von Karman Ave.
Irvine, CA 92614
Phone: +1 949-863-1999
Fax:+1 949-474-7236
 
$99 per night
Rate available until 6/30.
Located on Von Karman Avenue just off of the I-405. 1 mile from Orange County/John Wayne airport. Free shuttle service to and from John Wayne airport. Free parking at the hotel.
Orange County Airport Hilton
18800 MacArthur Blvd.
Irvine, CA 92612
Phone: +1 800-233-1234
Fax: +1 949-833-3317
 
$89.00 per night
Rate available until 6/30.
Adjacent to Orange County/John Wayne airport, 40 miles from LAX. Free shuttle service to and from Orange County/John Wayne airport and UCI, by arrangement. Parking: $4.00 per day for self parking. Valet parking also available.
Hyatt Regency
17900 Jamboree Road
Irvine, CA 92614
Phone: +1 949-975-1234
Fax: +1 949-852-1574
 
$103 per night -
the UCI rate

Rooms on an if-available basis only. You must indicate you are attending a UCI event.
You must make reservations with the hotel directly. Indicate you are attending WISEN at UCI.

Hotel room rates are subject to applicable state and local taxes. The rate and availablity after the date listed above are at the discretion of the hotel and are not guaranteed.

Aileen R. Broccardo
Information and Computer Science
University of California, Irvine
Irvine, CA 92697-3425
Phone: +1 (949) 824-1357
Fax: +1 (949) 824-1715

Information and Computer Science
